channel.title: Shop help
channel.description:
I wanted to create a shop from scratch. Under all the "wanneshops" in [b]client.java[/b] i added:
[code] } else if (NPCID == 1055) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 42; // Test shop
[/code]
i then went to [b]autospawn.cfg[/b] and added:
[code]spawn = 1055 2796 3433 0 0 0 0 0 0 NewNPC [/code]
[i]Then, [/i]i went to [b]shops.cfg[/b] and added:
[code]shop = 42 Testing_shop 1 1 1042 1 [/code]
I go to compile my server and it comes up with no errors, but when i [i]run[/i] my server, i get this appearing:
[code]Exeption in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatExeption: For input string: "42 Testing_shop" at java.lang.NumberFormatExeption.forInputSting(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:80) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:33) at server.main(server.java:115)[/code]
could someone please help me with this :confused:

item.title: Shop help
item.dc:creator: @new new
item.description:
@new wrote:

i found out that it was the NPC i was using. I changed and now it works fine. thanks very very much!

Read full topic

item.title: Shop help
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

On a few wL servers such as Czar, NPC second click packet is bugged, and won’t work on most NPC’s, try First click NPC packet, if that doesn’t work, then just move the npc to a new coordinates and it should, at least that’s what happened with a few of mine.

Read full topic

item.title: Shop help
item.dc:creator: @new new
item.description:
@new wrote:

ill try that thanks

Edit - hmm, i didn’t get an error this time, but when i try to trade the NPC nothing happens =P

Read full topic

item.title: Shop help
item.dc:creator: @new new
item.description:
@new wrote:

I wanted to create a shop from scratch. Under all the “wanneshops” in client.java i added:

[code] } else if (NPCID == 1055) {
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 42; // Test shop

[/code]

i then went to autospawn.cfg and added:

spawn = 1055 2796 3433 0 0 0 0 0 0 NewNPC

Then, i went to shops.cfg and added:

shop = 42 Testing_shop 1 1 1042 1

I go to compile my server and it comes up with no errors, but when i run my server, i get this appearing:

Exeption in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatExeption: For input string: "42 Testing_shop" at java.lang.NumberFormatExeption.forInputSting(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:80) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:33) at server.main(server.java:115)

could someone please help me with this

Read full topic
